name: jira-prepare-commit-msg
description: Husky Git hook to add JIRA ticket ID into the commit message
author: Dmitry Shilov

scripts.compile: npm run clean && npm run tsc
scripts.prepare:husky:2: cd ./test/husky2 && git init && git checkout -b JIRA-1234-test-husky2 && npm i
scripts.prepare:husky:3: cd ./test/husky3 && git init && git checkout -b JIRA-4321-test-husky3 && npm i
scripts.prepare:husky:4: cd ./test/husky4 && git init && git checkout -b JIRA-4321-test-husky4 && npm i
scripts.cleanup:husky:2: cd ./test/husky2 && rimraf .git && rimraf node_modules && rimraf package-lock.json
scripts.cleanup:husky:3: cd ./test/husky3 && rimraf .git && rimraf node_modules && rimraf package-lock.json
scripts.cleanup:husky:4: cd ./test/husky4 && rimraf .git && rimraf node_modules && rimraf package-lock.json
scripts.pretest: npm run prepare:husky:2 && npm run prepare:husky:3 && npm run prepare:husky:4
scripts.posttest: npm run cleanup:husky:2 && npm run cleanup:husky:3
